pullrequest.title: Add Insert tab to model editor

content.raw:
Planes are not supported in the model editor yet. We've disabled the editing option for planes if you right-click an existing model. But with this pull request, it is possible to insert planes from the panel, resulting in several errors like this:

~~~
[Err] [ConfigWidget.cc:2374] Error updating Geometry Config widget: 'plane' not found
~~~

I've ticketed issue #1769
content.html:
Planes are not supported in the model editor yet. We've disabled the editing option for planes if you right-click an existing model. But with this pull request, it is possible to insert planes from the panel, resulting in several errors like this:

[Err] [ConfigWidget.cc:2374] Error updating Geometry Config widget: 'plane' not found

I've ticketed issue #1769
